fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Dangerous: You have a hand size of 6 and draw 1 more card every phase. 
- Mask: Choose a role to disguise as within the first phase of the game. You will appear to win with others according to the role you chose.
- Tough Skin: You are immune to Chaos factionâ€™s Night phase attack.
- Some Strings Attached: You will know at all times who has at least one card with a String attached.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Preparations: Gain a non-special card of your choice. [4 uses, 1 CD]
- Entangle: Select a player other than yourself. Choose a card they draw in the next phase. It will secretly come with a String attached to it. [Infinite uses, 1 CD, Astral]
- Tug: Steal a card with a String attached. Gains a use whenever a player still holds a card with a String attached at the end of a Phase. [0 uses, 1 CD, Recharging, Astral]
- Death Bind: Play a Reforged Upgraded Attack! on a player. Gains a use whenever a player is Killed by you (including reforges) OR someone using a card with a String attached. [0 uses, Recharging]

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value: - Puppet: Choose a player who used a card with a String attached at any point in this game. Next phase, you control all of their card-playing actions. For the duration of that phase, you will know their entire hand and can make them play any and all cards they have. They will be unable to trade or spend their cards of their own volition in any way. This ability will fail if it is Final 3. [1 use, Unique, Astral]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be the last player remaining, excluding Mountebank/Outsider King.
